projects.title: SmartBike AI
projects.desc: Intelligent helmet concept with integrated AI that reacts to hazards in real time and issues audio warnings. Camera + compact processor (Nano-PC or Jetson Nano) with modern CV (YOLOv8, MediaPipe) to detect vehicles, motorcycles, and obstacles; warnings by position and speed. For cyclists, motorcyclists, wheelchair users, and people with reduced mobility.
